product_name: SAMSUNG Galaxy A03s Cell Phone, Factory Unlocked Android Smartphone, 32GB, Triple Lens Camera, Infinity Display Screen, Long Battery Life, Expandable Storage, US Version, Blue

question: What is best charger block for samsung Galaxy A03s. I recently purchase a phone from cricket but it did not came with charger block?

answers.answer: Thank you for your question, we always want you to have the best experience with our products, as such we would recommend that you use a Samsung charger block that is 7.75W or higher.
Any block will work. There is no point buying ones that offer fast charge as this feature is not compatible with the A03 phone

product_name: SAMSUNG Galaxy A03s Cell Phone, Factory Unlocked Android Smartphone, 32GB, Triple Lens Camera, Infinity Display Screen, Long Battery Life, Expandable Storage, US Version, Blue

question: Expandable storage?

answers.answer: Thanks for your interest. Yes, the Motorola One 5G Ace supports expandable storage (microSD card up to 1TB.) - Mike

It only supports added storage for files like photos, music etc. They did away with letting you add apps to the micro SD card. You can't format it for internal storage for apps which was a colossal mistake since a lot of your space on your internal drive is used up by the Android and their software.
Yes

product_name: Motorola One 5G Ace | 2021 | 2-Day battery | Unlocked | Made for US by Motorola | 6/128GB | 48MP Camera | Hazy Silver

question: Does this phone come with Facebook app already installed, and there is no way to get rid of it without rooting it?

answers.answer: Yes, it comes with the Facebook app installed but not prominently displayed.  To get rid of the useless thing, just go to the Play Store and uninstall it.  Then don't forget to go on and get rid of other intrusive and useless stuff, like much of the Google crap which offers to tie you into their infrastructure forever, giving up personal information for the whole time you have the phone.
Thanks for your interest. The Motorola One 5G Ace came with preinstalled Facebook App. - Mike
No. Facebook was installed automatically on mine because my previous phone (LG) came with it and was on my backup which was restored. I was quickly able to delete the crappy thing.

product_name: Motorola One 5G Ace | 2021 | 2-Day battery | Unlocked | Made for US by Motorola | 6/128GB | 48MP Camera | Hazy Silver

question: Does it has active dual sim ?

answers.answer: No.  However, the Edge+(2022) does support ESIM and so will the newly released Edge(2022).  Typically only select models sold by Motorola offer the dual SIM and none recently to the US versions sold..
Thanks for your interest. The Motorola One 5G Ace only supports single SIM (1 Nano SIM + 1 microSD). - Mike
Some different Moto models do offer an active dual sim capability but they're only available on  International versions of the phone.

product_name: Motorola One 5G Ace | 2021 | 2-Day battery | Unlocked | Made for US by Motorola | 6/128GB | 48MP Camera | Hazy Silver

question: Is this device Dual Sim i.e. 2 physical sim slots?

answers.answer: Mine only is only capable of one SIM card.

question: Does the box contain plug point socket as well?

answers.answer: It does not. Charger is sold separately. I personally bought the 40W Spigen super charger and I love it so far. It is also cheaper then the samsung charger 40w charger.
Nope, just wire and it's c type on both ends
